content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), ServiceTier, sum(Cost)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), ServiceTier
ORDER BY substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), ServiceTier
